name: GoldrkcCoin
description: GoldrkCoin (GDRK) is a BEP-20 token inspired by the iconic anime series Goldrake (or UFO Robot Grendizer) from the 1980s. With the upcoming release of a major Goldrake movie, the GDRK token aims to create a digital ecosystem that celebrates the legacy of this beloved character and provides fans with new ways to engage and interact.
